ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of August, 1997, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted and the decision of the Superi- or Court is reversed pursuant to Commonwealth v. Jarman, 529 Pa. 92, 601 A.2d 1229 (1992), and Commonwealth v. Modaffare, 529 Pa. 101, 601 A.2d 1233 (1992).
